mapper.select: select s.id id,s.name sname,SUM(o.number*c.price)-SUM(o.number*r.price) sumprice FROM shop_order o,shop_cs cs,shop_co co,shop_commodity c,shop_repertory r,shop_shop s where cs.shop_id=#{id} and cs.shop_id=s.id and co.order_id=o.id and cs.commodity_id=co.commodity_id and c.name=r.commodityname
